summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; authorizing the Director to enter into a contract with the State of Washington Department of Community Development providing federal funds for the purchase of specialized equipment for the Fire Department's Urban Search and Rescue Team; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1993 Budget of the Department of Administrative Services; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
